title: The Probate of Deeds Act
description: Category: statute | Source: https://laws.moj.gov.jm/library/statute/the-probate-of-deeds-act | Legal areas: Trusts and Estates

provisions.title: Section 6
provisions.content:
6.    Deeds executed outside the Island may be proved or acknow-
        ledged before Notary Public.

provisions.title: Section 14
provisions.content:
14.   Deed requiring probate before 1863.
         mhe inclusion of this page is authorized by L.N. 3/2001]
